about_the_game:
A cute little project made by 2 people in 3 months.

A retro styled 3D platformer that let's players come at challenges from whatever angle you want. Ashley Dengra is a 9nth grade artist with a sketchbook to doodle her "Original Characters" like Misa Ikko, the green-haired, feathery-eared fire sword girl with a great fluffy green tail.

Features:

- Soothing Original Soundtrack made by talented the Naoya Sakamata
- Beautiful Art
- Free Form 3D Platforming Action
- Blade Wave Sword Combat
- A climb from an underground beach below the planets core all the way to the sky!
detailed_description:
A cute little project made by 2 people in 3 months.

A retro styled 3D platformer that let's players come at challenges from whatever angle you want. Ashley Dengra is a 9nth grade artist with a sketchbook to doodle her "Original Characters" like Misa Ikko, the green-haired, feathery-eared fire sword girl with a great fluffy green tail.

Features:

- Soothing Original Soundtrack made by talented the Naoya Sakamata
- Beautiful Art
- Free Form 3D Platforming Action
- Blade Wave Sword Combat
- A climb from an underground beach below the planets core all the way to the sky!
legal_notice: Feathery Ears 羽耳 and all game content belongs to Sayuri Artsy and Eager Passion LLC.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: mac OS Mojave Version 10.14.2
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Flexible Quality Settings Available
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: mac OS Mojave Version 10.14.2
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 20
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Flexible Quality Settings Available

  • Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.61GHz (8 CPU), ~2.6GHz
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM

short_description: Below the planet's core, Misa wakes up on a pink beach to learn that Gembugs have pulled the stars out of the sky. Her friend Coral gives her a Fire Sword to defeat them. It's up to her to bring the stars back up where they belong.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
